control.label: [B]$VAR[FirstLabelVar][/B]
control.visible: Skin.HasSetting(NetFiixHideFilmInfo) + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(clearlogo))] | [Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) + [IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(tvshow.clearlogo)) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(clearlogo))]]

animation.condition: Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(OpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart))) | Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting)| Skin.Hassetting(fakediscart)] + !Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterList)

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(OpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart))) | Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting)| Skin.Hassetting(fakediscart)] + !Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterList)

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(OpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart))) | !IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(poster))] + Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterList)

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(OpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart))) | Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting)| Skin.Hassetting(fakediscart)] + !Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterList)

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(OpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart))) | Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting)| Skin.Hassetting(fakediscart)] + !Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterList)

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(OpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart))) | !IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(poster))] + Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterList)
